title: Book of Mazarbul (3R1)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.
Lore:	”'It seems to be a record of the fortunes of Balin's folk….'”
Rarity:	R
